channel.title: Please Can someone Please help me? i'll REward You!
channel.description:
I got a Compiler 317 Blank source i Seted The right java
JDK1.6.0_25
But when I want to Click on the "Compile.bat" it say's
[code=javascript]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M ain Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit. Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .[/code]

item.title: Please Can someone Please help me? i'll REward You!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Groen Mod Groen
item.description:
@Mod_Groen wrote:

Try this code:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: Please Can someone Please help me? i'll REward You!
